title: Do You Have A Problem With Me?
description:
Safety is the number one concern of the Kirk Minihane Show... That's why we sought out a second opinion for a scary situation that developed yesterday afternoon (00:07:25). OJ is free and his lawyers first thought is to call Kirk Minihane (00:23:30). Chris Klemmer is 'New and Noteworthy' on Apple Podcasts (00:37:25). Ben Affleck says he'd be drinking if he was married to Jennifer Garner still (00:38:50). ESPN blatantly lies about the Bubba Wallace "noose" outcome (00:47:10). Rico Bosco joins to discuss the taping of the Dozen, Genesis' set list stinks & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
